Package renderers_and_editors

Contains renderer objects that render the colored patch (GeometryTableIconRenderer) and the remove button (LayerRemoveButtonRenderer) for each layer instance in the table of contents.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GeometryPanelEditor
    Table cell editor for the geometry panel inside the table of contents.
    Opens color chooser for changing the color of the layer
    GeometryTableIconRenderer
    Class to render the geometry icon on the table cell
    LayerNameEditor
    Class handles the changing of layer names from the table of contents.
    LayerRemoveButtonEditor
    Button for removing layer at the table of contents.
    LayerRemoveButtonRenderer
    Class which renders the remove icon on the table cell

Package renderers_and_editors Description

Contains renderer objects that render the colored patch (GeometryTableIconRenderer) and the remove button (LayerRemoveButtonRenderer) for each layer instance in the table of contents.
